Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2013 06:11PM Seedsfrance wrote: Thanks so much for your response. Is there anyone out there with my symptoms? And if so, how did it resolve. Also, how would they diagnose IBC if there's no lump to be picked up on ultrasound or mammography?
Posts.Title: Red mark, no lump Seedsfrance Seedsfrance

Posts.Content: Seedsfrance wrote: About a week ago I noticed a red mark slightly larger than the diameter of a pea on my left breast not near the nipple. There's no pain, no lump, nothing unusual about the skin, just redness that goes away upon pressing it, but comes back immediately thereafter. I just made an appointment with the local doctor here in rural France, but I don't know if she's ever seen this sort of thing in her practice. Yikes! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Red mark, no lump Seedsfrance Seedsfrance
